name: Mithril shield
data: It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users physical resistance a bit.
It increases the users magical resistance a bit.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'true harmony'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users acid resistance a bit.
It increases the users fire resistance a bit.
It increases the users cold resistance a bit.
